SEARCH
Package org.ddolib.ddo.core.compilation

Class CompilationConfig<T>

java.lang.Object
org.ddolib.ddo.core.compilation.CompilationConfig<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type representing the state of the problem
public class CompilationConfig<T> extends Object
Represents the configuration parameters used during the compilation of a Multi-valued Decision Diagram (MDD) or similar decision structure.

A CompilationConfig object stores all components and heuristics required to guide the compilation process â€” including relaxations, heuristics, bounds, and pruning mechanisms.

See Also:

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Double
    bestUB
    Stores the best known upper bound on the objective function at the time of MDD compilation.
    Optional<SimpleCache<T>>
    cache
    Optional cache used to avoid redundant computations and prune the search space efficiently.
    CompilationType
    compilationType
    Specifies how the MDD is compiled.
    CutSetType
    cutSetType
    Defines the type of cut set used to control the structure and pruning of the MDD during compilation.
    DebugLevel
    debugLevel
    Defines the debugging level of the compilation process.
    DominanceChecker<T>
    dominance
    Dominance checker used to identify and prune dominated states from the search space.
    Boolean
    exportAsDot
    Indicates whether the compiled MDD should be exported to a DOT file (Graphviz format) for visualization.
    FastLowerBound<T>
    flb
    Heuristic used to compute a quick estimation (lower bound) of the optimal objective value during search.
    Integer
    maxWidth
    Defines the maximum number of nodes (width) allowed per MDD layer.
    Problem<T>
    problem
    Reference to the original optimization or constraint problem to be solved.
    ReductionStrategy<T>
    reductionStrategy
    The Reduction Strategy that should be used to select nodes to merge/drop
    Relaxation<T>
    relaxation
    Defines the relaxation model used to merge or approximate nodes during relaxed MDD compilation.
    SubProblem<T>
    residual
    Represents the subproblem or residual problem whose state space must be explored in the compilation process.
    StateRanking<T>
    stateRanking
    Ranking heuristic used to prioritize states and select which nodes to keep when pruning the MDD.
    VariableHeuristic<T>
    variableHeuristic
    Heuristic used to decide which variable to branch on next during the compilation process.

  • Field Details

    • compilationType

      public CompilationType compilationType
      Specifies how the MDD is compiled.

      Determines whether the compilation is exact, relaxed, approximate, or hybrid, depending on the algorithm used.

    • problem

      public Problem<T> problem
      Reference to the original optimization or constraint problem to be solved.

    • relaxation

      public Relaxation<T> relaxation
      Defines the relaxation model used to merge or approximate nodes during relaxed MDD compilation.

    • variableHeuristic

      public VariableHeuristic<T> variableHeuristic
      Heuristic used to decide which variable to branch on next during the compilation process.

    • stateRanking

      public StateRanking<T> stateRanking
      Ranking heuristic used to prioritize states and select which nodes to keep when pruning the MDD.

    • residual

      public SubProblem<T> residual
      Represents the subproblem or residual problem whose state space must be explored in the compilation process.

    • maxWidth

      public Integer maxWidth
      Defines the maximum number of nodes (width) allowed per MDD layer.

      Controls the trade-off between accuracy and performance.

    • flb

      public FastLowerBound<T> flb
      Heuristic used to compute a quick estimation (lower bound) of the optimal objective value during search.

    • dominance

      public DominanceChecker<T> dominance
      Dominance checker used to identify and prune dominated states from the search space.

    • cache

      public Optional<SimpleCache<T>> cache
      Optional cache used to avoid redundant computations and prune the search space efficiently.

    • bestUB

      public Double bestUB
      Stores the best known upper bound on the objective function at the time of MDD compilation.

    • cutSetType

      public CutSetType cutSetType
      Defines the type of cut set used to control the structure and pruning of the MDD during compilation.

    • exportAsDot

      public Boolean exportAsDot
      Indicates whether the compiled MDD should be exported to a DOT file (Graphviz format) for visualization.

    • debugLevel

      public DebugLevel debugLevel
      Defines the debugging level of the compilation process.

      Higher levels include more internal consistency checks and detailed logging, at the cost of runtime performance.

      See Also:
      • DebugLevel

    • reductionStrategy

      public ReductionStrategy<T> reductionStrategy
      The Reduction Strategy that should be used to select nodes to merge/drop

      Initialize the parameters of the compilation.
